page.title: 06A Town House in Kirkby
page.content: My name is Susan. I live in a Town House. We have 2 bedrooms. We have 6 rooms altogether. Inside our house we have a gas cooker, an electric fire and gas central heating. We have a front and a back garden. At the front of our house and at the back there are Town Houses. In our street there are no shops, phone boxes, post boxes, garages, factories, offices or trees. We do not have double glazing or extensions. Our house was built in 1973 and my mum and dad chose it because they had no other choice. There are a number of amenities near our house. There is a pub, a health clinic and a shop. Both of my parents work. My mum is a store's assistant and my dad is a newsagent manager but he used to be a butcher.
